Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. This item is truly a masterpiece, crafted with the finest materials and attention to detail. It's not just an object; it's a statement of quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $125. This price reflects its true value and the benefits it will bring to you. I trust that once you experience its quality, you'll see the investment is well worth it. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
